title: I can't see a support ticket
body:
Hi,
Someone stole my account, so I send to Riot support a ticket #27871034 but when I click on the link in email http://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/27871034 site wants me to log in and when I log in I just can see: 
OOPS  The page you were looking for doesn't exist.
You may have mistyped the address or the page may have moved.
Take me back to the home page. ;(

So I am asking, did Riot get my ticket or is somewhere lost? I send them second ticket (I know, it's stupid thing to do but I wanted to try it) and it says the same thing. :(

I hope you can help me. Thanks :)

replies.body:
Account recovery tickets require you to be logged out (for security purposes), therefore you aren't able to login to Riot Support to check the status of your ticket.

We address ticket in the order they're received, so you'll receive a response as soon as we get to your ticket. I hope that cleared up the confusion.

Thank you very much :D  {{champion:103}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} 
I love u RIOT <3
